name: Deadly Avarice
description:
Deadly Avarice is a (rarely) relaxing arcade shooter/clicker game where every upgrade also makes your life worse!

Made for Mini Jam 111: Colors

Feedback is greatly appreciated! although I probably won't update this all that much.

tracks from:

http://www.streamselects.com

sound from:
